title: Ministry Unit Room Management System
description: Modernized facility management by centralizing room bookings into a single secure platform, enabling efficient resource sharing across multiple organizational units.

title: Furaya Hotel Front Desk Management System

title: MassBeat - Workout and Trainer Consultation
description: A unified home workout ecosystem designed to consolidate fragmented fitness tools into a consistent, user-centered platform for trainees and instructors.
